definition: first letter of a word or serial number/first character of a Chinese word/first digit of a number/the top part (esp. a radical) of a Chinese character/the initial of a Chinese syllable
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
name of "walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 夂[zhi3]
Phillips screwdriver (i.e. with cross slit)
"top of 左 character" component in Chinese characters
lit. there is a knife above the character for lust/fig. lascivious activities can lead to bitter consequences

definition: grass radical 艹
name of "tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)/see also 虍[hu1]
"top of 青 character" component in Chinese characters

sentences.english: The plunger is clamped into the crosshead .
Connection rod and crass head is alloy-casting pieces.
sentences.chinese: 连杆为合金钢铸件，十字头为球墨铸铁。

sentences.english: This rigid connection ensures the concentricity of extension rod and crosshead.
sentences.chinese: 十字头与中间拉杆之间为销孔配合的法兰螺栓连接。

sentences.english: Connections for main and crosshead lubrication.
sentences.chinese: 主润滑油路和十字头润滑的连接。
十字头销为合金钢锻件。

sentences.english: The crosshead also holds the guide-tip and the wire die.
sentences.chinese: 十字头的联杆器挤带有指示针和电线模具。

sentences.english: The crosshead carries a crosshead pin which is encircled by the upper end of the connecting rod.
sentences.chinese: 十字头通过一个十字销与连杆上端连接。

sentences.english: Just like with naming tables, avoid using abbreviations, acronyms or special characters.
sentences.chinese: 就像表名需要避免缩写，全字头缩写或者特殊字符。

sentences.english: The crankcases are finished and mounted as are the crosshead guides.
sentences.chinese: 完成的曲轴箱和安装的是十字头指南。

sentences.english: For all parts of the table name, including prefixes, use Pascal Case.
sentences.chinese: 所有的表名，包括字头，都使用。
